subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object that defines configuration properties for the UI component.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<String, CollectionWidgetItem> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: itemComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [itemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: itemHoldTimeout
subMembers.description: The time period in milliseconds before the **onItemHold** event is raised.

subMembers.name: itemRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [itemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: itemTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for items.

subMembers.name: items
subMembers.description: An array of items displayed by the UI component.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the key property that provides key values to access data items. Each key value must be unique.

subMembers.name: noDataText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text or HTML markup displayed by the UI component if the item collection is empty.

subMembers.name: selectedIndex
subMembers.description: The index of the currently selected UI component item.

subMembers.name: selectedItemKeys
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of currently selected item keys.

subMembers.name: selectedItems
subMembers.description: An array of currently selected item objects.

properties.name: CollectionWidget
properties.description: The base class for UI components containing an item collection.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemDeleted
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: onItemDeleting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a collection item is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: onItemHold
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: onItemReordered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is moved to another position.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is called after selection changes.

Events.name: onSelectionChanging
Events.description: A function that is called before selection changes.

Events.name: itemClick
Events.description: Raised when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: itemContextMenu
Events.description: Raised when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: itemDeleted
Events.description: Raised after a collection item is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: itemDeleting
Events.description: Raised before a collection item is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: itemHold
Events.description: Raised when a collection item has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: itemRendered
Events.description: Raised after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: itemReordered
Events.description: Raised after a collection item is moved to another position.
